text: Oud-Reeuwijk is a village in the Dutch province of South Holland. It is a part of the former municipality of Reeuwijk, and lies about 4 km north of Gouda. The statistical area "Oud-Reeuwijk", which also can include the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 120.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005. As of 1 January 2005. ==References== Category:Bodegraven-Reeuwijk Category:Populated places in South Holland
title: Oud-Reeuwijk
